meanings.definition: In a lecherous manner; with excessive or offensive sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: He stared lecherously at the waitress, making her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: He behaved lecherously towards his coworker, leading to a complaint.
meanings.sent3: The lecherously dressed man tried to impress the ladies at the party.
meanings.sent4: His eyes moved lecherously over the magazine covers at the store.
meanings.sent5: The villain in the movie lecherously pursued the innocent protagonist.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by lecherous behavior.
meanings.sent1: The lecherously grinning man made everyone uneasy at the party.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the lecherously advancing stranger at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The lecherously laughing hyena seemed out of place in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: His lecherously charming smile hid his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The lecherously written novel was banned in several countries.
